name: Kay
text: I've never been so disappointed with Papa Gino's. I go often. I usually go to the one on East Main ST in Marlborough because I live much closer to that one. Just happens to be that I work near the one next to Hannafords. Let's start with …More

name: js0
text: For a place that offers both take-out & delivery, the wait time seemed a little long to me when dining in with only about 4 other people here. But this location was great as far as first impressions for someone who's never even seen a Papa …More

name: Danielle Sullivan
text: Food is standard Papa Gino's and fine, when you finally get it. We usually order pizza once a week and with three kids I prefer to use the delivery option. There have been a number of times now that the food has taken 2 hours or more to …More

name: Janina Ramos
text: Placed my order in advance online so that I could have it ready for the time I had chosen since I was on my way to work. When I arrived I was standing at the register for a good 3-5 minutes before I was acknowledged and when finally …More

name: Jim Griffin
text:
Pizza was very good as always with Papa Gino's.

But this location seemed to be understaffed for a busy location on a Friday …More

name: Kathy Musiak
text: It took forever to take our food. My steak and cheese with extra cheese seemed to be lacking in the cheese department. They had no milk for the kids. My son only drinks regular. He doesn't like chocolate which may have been an option. The …More

name: brad covistole
text: This is probably one of the best places to go in Marlborough. I never liked papa ginos pizza because of the small bits of tomato in the sauce. But everything else from here, is amazing. I order from here a lot because my family orders out a …More

name: Claudio Elias
text:
If you don't mind wait 15 minutes to get your small Italian (no cooking, or toasting) from a store empty of customers, than you are ok.
The person in charge of the food, walks around the store waring dirty and …More

name: Beth Bennett
text: Or was ok.  I really was craving papa's,  but it wasn't like I remembered.   The pizza sauce was just as always,  but the pizza looked like cooked frozen pizza and not cooked enough.   My soda was flat (fountain drink) and the restraunt was pre lunch rush and I had to look for clean table.   It wasn't bad,  just wasn't good.

name: Nancy Harris
text: I actually wouldn' give it 1 star. This is the second time in a row that the food wad terrible. The pizza was very greasy and the didn't even cut it. The staff seemed to have plenty of time to text while I was waiting. I mentioned that last …More

name: Chris Layton
text: Love the BBQ pizza, chicken or sweet pulled pork. The sauce is amazing, although it's a little sweet.

name: Mark Cross
text: I went to have the all you can eat pizza and was the only person there took me 16 minutes to get 2 slices of pizza and another 8 minutes to get my 3rd.  Very disappointing.

name: Bethany Catob
text: Good pizza, good price. Clean inside

name: Heather Tudor
text: Ordered for a client. They gave me a coupon I didn't know about and the service was fast.
